short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A chrome extension for viewing one's blood sugar

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Daia Diabetes: Blood Sugar Display

Connect your Dexcom CGM to see your blood sugar in real time! 

You can pin the extension to always see your blood sugar in the top right corner of your Chrome Window.

Click on the icon to see your blood sugar trend!

All you need to do is install the extension and log in to your Dexcom account. Compatible with US-based G6 and G7 accounts. 
_____

This extension was designed by the Daia Development team. 
At Daia, we are working to make Diabetes Safer, Simpler, and Smarter. 
_____

The data delivered on this app is for informational purposes and should not be used to make medical decisions of any kind. Please check with a doctor before making any medical decisions.

This application is not owned by or affiliated with Dexcom
